refnamediv.refpurpose: get DSA signature size or key bits

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int DSA_size(const DSA *dsa); int DSA_bits(const DSA *dsa);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: DSA_size() returns the maximum size of an ASN.1 encoded DSA signature for key dsa in bytes. It can be used to determine how much memory must be allocated for a DSA signature.
DSA_bits() returns the number of bits in key dsa: this is the number of bits in the p parameter.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUE
refsection.para: DSA_size() returns the size in bytes.
DSA_bits() returns the number of bits in the key.
